description.en:
The Public Registry of Panama is a dependency of the Ministry of Government and Justice and it's the sole property registry of Panama [1]. Corporations and Foundations are required to be registered in the Public Registry of Panama. 
[1]. https://registro-publico.gob.pa/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=147&Itemid=501

access.onlineAccessDetails: Organisations and their identifiers can be located on the Panadata website which is not a state-run platform.
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Search for an organisation through the interface. Their registration number is returned as part of the results and it's called File number.
